Name: 绮罗四时谭
About the game: In some places, there is a custom to offer sacrifices to the mountain gods in order to pray for peace and prosperity. It is rumored that this ritual has been passed down from generation to generation for a long time. This time, being chosen as a victim is... The player will play the friend of the victim, a high school girl, looking for ways to save important friends, and go to the unpredictable mountains without hesitation. During the period, I will fight against different monsters, improve myself, and I will meet different characters and understand different stories... And what will eventually bring up, will be discovered by the players, full of mysterious and incredible Japanese style. Story RPG.
